data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
The Module will provide an abstraction layer to allow programmers
    to focus on checking accounts, transferring money and paying bills
    without having to worry about the http requests that their actions
    require. There is nothing out there at the moment that does all
    this, but the closest is Simon Cozens' Finance::Bank::LloydsTSB, so
    I followed the existing namespace rules as close as possible.
